OUTLINE : - Non-myeloablative preparative regimen : Patients receive fludarabine IV 30 minute day -7 -3 , busulfan IV 2 hour every 8 hour day -4 -3 , anti-thymocyte globulin IV 8 hour day -4 -1 . - Transplantation : Patients undergo allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation day 0 .
